Package ml.alternet.security.algorithms

Third-party algorithms adapted for the Password class and that ensure that they are using safe buffers internally when possible.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Argon2.Constants  
    Argon2.Constants.Constraints  
    Argon2.Constants.Defaults  
    Blake2b  
    Blake2b.Param.Default  
    Blake2b.Spec  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Argon2  
    Argon2.Block  
    Argon2.Functions  
    Argon2.Instance  
    Argon2.Position  
    BCrypt
    BCrypt implements OpenBSD-style Blowfish password hashing using the scheme described in "A Future-Adaptable Password Scheme" by Niels Provos and David Mazieres.
    Blake2b.Digest
    Generalized Blake2b digest.
    Blake2b.Engine  
    Blake2b.Engine.Assert  
    Blake2b.Engine.Debug  
    Blake2b.Mac
    Message Authentication Code (MAC) digest.
    Blake2b.Param
    Blake2b configuration parameters block per spec
    Blake2b.Tree
    Note that Tree is just a convenience class; incremental hash (tree) can be done directly with the Digest class.
    MD4
    Implements the MD4 message digest algorithm in Java.
    MD5Crypt
    Encrypt an OpenBSD/FreeBSD/Linux-compatible md5-salted-encoded password.
    PBKDF2  
    SHA2Crypt
    SHA2-based Unix crypt implementation.
    UnixCrypt
    Unix crypt(3C) utility

Package ml.alternet.security.algorithms Description

Third-party algorithms adapted for the Password class and that ensure that they are using safe buffers internally when possible.
